house_listing.house_description: Great flow floor plan & square footage for a ranch 2 car garage. Large eat-in kitchen & big utility room. Sun room/porch offers 7 windows. Extra large fenced backyard. Wet bar in family room new roof & exterior paint. New carpet & vinyl.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Foyer, Garage DoorOpener, Pantry, Ranch Style, Sun Room, Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
